monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Transforms player into a Blob - Allows to traverse narrow corridors
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Arcane Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery (Buff)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (120 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Bubble Burst
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 45% (225%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Chilling Cold
skills.description: Every Water attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Debuff Weakness
skills.description: Debuff effects increased by 50%

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Fatal Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Poison, Burn and Congeal damage dealt to enemies is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Full Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (200 + 40% Magic) Applies Glory, Barrier, Channel & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Initial Armor Break
skills.description: Apply Armor Break (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Initial Weakness
skills.description: Apply Weakness (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Regeneration Shield
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) also shields the Monster by 7.5% of its Max Health at the start of turn.

skills.name: Remunerate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 60% chance to gain Regeneration (Buff).

skills.name: Replenish
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (300 + 50% Magic) Shield all for 2 x (350 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Slime Volley
skills.description: 2 x 50% (100%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slimy Support
skills.description: Aura: Healing and shielding skills (active and passive) of Slimes in your party are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Static Mass
skills.description: 30% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a non-Critical Hit during attacks.

skills.name: Sustain
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Trickster Buffing
skills.description: For every buff applied there is a 15% chance to apply Chill, Shock or Burn to a random enemy.

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Cookie Mushroom
drops.description: Increases damage, healing and shielding of this monster by 3%.

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster
